mapper.select:
select request_url,request_param as request_param_byte,take_time,create_time,souce_of_system,result_info as result_info_byte from t_outside_api_log
and request_url like '%${requestUrl}%' and souce_of_system like '%${souceOfSystem}%'
and create_time between str_to_date(#{createTimeStart},' %Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd},' %Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
